features: Easy-to-Use Cell Phone: With a large screen, list-based menu, and voice typing, the Jitterbug Smart3 mobile phone easy to use the moment you turn it on
Stay Connected: Staying connected with family and friends is easy with this cell phone's powerful speaker, long-lasting battery, and video chat
Caring Team: Once your new phone is activated with Lively, the Lively team is here to help whether you want to learn more about your new phone, need a ride, have a health concern or even an emergency
Affordable, Flexible Plans: Include unlimited talk, text and 24/7 access to Lively’s caring team; the Jitterbug Smart3 is only compatible with Lively phone service
Why Lively: Lively offers Jitterbug cell phones and Lively medical alert devices that help seniors stay connected, safe and healthy
body.description: Item No. 0187364 The Jitterbug Smart3 is designed with seniors in mind. Everything from texting, emailing, getting directions and browsing the internet is organized in a simple, list-based menu on one screen with large, legible letters. A long-lasting battery, voice typing, and video chat allow you the flexibility to stay in touch, the way you want. And, with access to exclusive health and safety services, you have an entire response team by your side. Unlimited talk and text is just $19.99/month with data plans as low as $2.49/month. Large 6.2" screen and simple list-based menu make it easy to see the buttons and navigate the phone. Voice typing makes texing and emailing easy. Long-lasting battery so you can use the phone as long as you like without worrying about charging. Urgent Response button for emergency help, 24/7. Access to board certified doctors and registered nurses 24/7. MORE INFORMATION More Information Product Name Lively Jitterbug Smart3 Smartphone for Seniors Package Count 1 Container Type other Country of Manufacture China Prop 65 Yes SAFETY DIMENSIONS Dimensions Depth 22.8 Width 10.7 Height 7.4 Weight 1.405 lb

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.0 4.0 out of 5 stars 1,522 ratings 4.0 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This Jitter bug phone is easy to use at a very reasonable price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for your favorite elder
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for my 86 year old roommate and shenloves it. Its simple for her to use as she can see the screen very clearly. Its loud enough that she can hear the ring tone and she was able to text for the first time.Setup was easy no issues. I did a test call to customer service and while i had to have them call me back they did so within 10 minutes.Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Phone for Cost
reviews.reviewText: I am still learning about my new Jitterbug 3 phone. Thus far, it seems to suit my basic needs which are texting, camera, and sending/receiving calls. It has more features than I truly need or use, but I am slogging my way through internet use, and the screen configurations that are different from my old Jitterbug 2. Tutorials in the phone are not always helpful, but going through them more than once sometimes pays off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Worst buy of a lifetime
reviews.reviewText: This is supposed to be easy to use. Yes, there are many other bad reviews, but somehow I was hopeful and tried it anyway. It's my third cell phone, and the only one that I may have to return or throw into the trash. First of all, to set it up, you're supposed to call a certain phone number. But when you dial that number, all you get is a recording that says the number is out of service. Then, somewhere in the instruction booklet, I found a second phone number, but that number gave the same result as the first one. So I called their Customer Service. That person managed, after about an hour, and with some difficulty, to connect me to a "set-up specialist" with whom I spent two or three hours on the phone. Finally she said my phone was ready to go. But it wasn't. It still won't receive incoming calls. It's advertised as "simple," but it's by far the most ridiculously complicated and impossible to use of any phone I've tried. I will be either returning it or tossing it into the trash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great phone for the technically challenged! Easy to use and with all the features of a smartphone but none of the headaches. Tech support is great also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nicely simple phone, but does NOT have the feature to limit callers to those in address book
reviews.reviewText: I got the phone for someone starting down the dementia/alzheimers route because all the features, buzzing of alerts we could not seem to keep turned off on her android was driving her crazy -- BUT we were able to block out callers who were not in her address book which is good for keeping scammers and dubious salespeople away from her.the jitterbug phone VERY nicely is simple and straightforward for her to use, but if the blocking of unknown callers is a need you have, don't get it till they offer it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my 90 year old father who still has a flip phone! He wanted to text and this phones software is very user friendly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I have had this company's phones for many years
reviews.reviewText: I have had my phone service with this company for years. Great value for the money and the service is outstanding. Highly recommend.
